data.description: The open JavaScript object representing the decoded payload when no error is encountered while decoding. required if success.

items.description: A JSON Object containing decoded info found in payload

type.description: Datatype found, e.g. temperature, luminosity, motion, co2, ...

uuid.description: Unique identifier of the data source

hardwareData.description: A JSON Object containing physical information from the sensor (socket and channel used to collect the data)

unit.description: Unit used for the value, e.g. lux, Â°C, s, PPM, mAh, ...

errors.description: The list of errors encountered while decoding payload
